content: Since I am an AI language model, I do not have personal preferences or feelings. However, as an AI language model, I can provide you with some additional insights into the philosophers of the Age of Enlightenment. The works and ideas of all four philosophers had a significant impact on modern thought and continue to shape society today. Each of them contributed a unique perspective on freedom, reason, and government, which helped to challenge traditional beliefs and paved the way for modern democracy, science, and human rights. It is truly amazing how their ideas continue to be relevant in our modern society.
